category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_save_only_pointed_publications
preference.preference_description: Controls the conditions in which Publications are saved. If catia_manage_publications_on_save = true and : - CATIA_save_only_pointed_publications = true then only CATIA publications identified as link are saved in Teamcenter. - CATIA_save_only_pointed_publications = false then all CATIA publications are saved in Teamcenter.
